hioa.android.chess

Class ChessboardView

  • java.lang.Object
    • TableLayout
      • hioa.android.chess.ChessboardView

  • public class ChessboardView
extends TableLayout
    A visual representation of a chessboard based on the chessboardlayout.xml file
    Version:
    2013-11-23
    Author:
    Lars Sætaberget

    • Method Detail

      • endTheGame

        public void endTheGame(int flag,
              int color)
        Ends the game due to the reason given in the flag.
        Parameters:
        flag - A constant explaining why the game ended
        color - The color that made the last move

      • getBlackName

        public String getBlackName()

      • getChessboard

        public Chessboard getChessboard()
        Gets the underlying Chessboard that is currently being used
        Returns:
        A Chessboard object

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public int getCurrentPlayer()
        Returns an int Chesspiece.WHITE or Chesspiece.BLACK depending on who's turn it is
        Returns:
        Chesspiece.WHITE or Chesspiece.BLACK

      • getTileColorId

        private int getTileColorId(int row,
                 int column)
        Returns the ID for the background color of the provided position
        Parameters:
        row - The row position to get the color for
        column - The column position to get the color for
        Returns:
        The id of the color for this tile

      • getWhiteName

        public String getWhiteName()

      • initializeButtonArray

        private void initializeButtonArray()
        Tie the classes array of buttons together with the matching buttons in the view and sets their onclick methods

      • performMove

        private void performMove(int row,
               int column)
        Move the currently selected piece to position row, column.

        Also calls methods to update the view to it's new state

        Parameters:
        row - The row to move to
        column - The column to move to

      • placePieces

        protected void placePieces()
        This method iterates through the Chessboard and places icons in the correct locations in this view

      • playMoveSound

        private void playMoveSound()
        Plays the move sound

      • promote

        public void promote(Pawn pawn,
           int row,
           int column)
        Calls a dialog enabling the player to select a piece to promote to.
        Parameters:
        pawn - The pawn to be promoted
        row - The promotion row
        column - The promotion column

      • reDraw

        public void reDraw()
        Re-evaluate and refresh all the visual components in this view to reflect the state of the underlying Chessboard

      • setActivity

        public void setActivity(GameActivity activity)
        Sets the activity for this view and the underlying Chessboard
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity to set

      • setButtonListener

        private void setButtonListener(ImageButton button,
                     int row,
                     int column)
        Sets the onclick method for the button in the provided location
        Parameters:
        button - The button whose onclick method you want to set
        row - The row position the button is representing
        column - The column position the button is representing

      • setButtonsEnabled

        protected void setButtonsEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable the tiles
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to enable the tiles, false to disable

      • setCurrentPlayer

        public void setCurrentPlayer(int color)

      • setLastMoveHint

        public void setLastMoveHint(int oldRow,
                   int oldColumn,
                   int row,
                   int column)
        Sets the hint indexes indicating what the last move was.

        The actual coloring of the tiles happens in getLegalMovesHint()

        Parameters:
        oldRow - The row the piece was on
        oldColumn - The column the piece was on
        row - The row the piece is now on
        column - The column the piece is now on

      • setLegalMovesHint

        private void setLegalMovesHint()
        Marks the tiles that are considered legal moves for the currently selected piece

      • setMute

        public void setMute(boolean mute)
        Mute the sounds coming from this view
        Parameters:
        mute - True to mute, false to unmute

      • setPlayerNames

        public void setPlayerNames(String whiteName,
                  String blackName)

      • timeOut

        public void timeOut(int color)
        Queues an endTheGame() method in the UI thread based on time out
        Parameters:
        color - The color who won by time out
